hero.title: Family-friendly houses for rent in Germany
hero.subtitle: Enjoy more space, your own four walls and a private garden – without having to buy a property right away.

introText: Renting a house combines flexibility with the feeling of having your own home. It is ideal for families, people working from home or anyone who needs more space and appreciates a quieter neighbourhood.
perksTitle: Why renting a house is a great choice

perks.title: More space for everyone
perks.text: Generous living areas, several rooms and often additional storage or hobby rooms – perfect for families, home office and guests.

perks.title: Private garden
perks.text: Whether it’s a sandbox, barbecue evenings or your own vegetable patch: An outdoor area offers freedom and quality of life, especially for children and pets.

perks.title: Privacy & peace
perks.text: No neighbours above or below you. A house usually offers more distance to others and a calmer living environment.

perks.title: Flexible instead of tied down
perks.text: Renting instead of buying keeps you flexible. If your job or life situation changes, you can move more easily and are not tied to one location for decades.

stepsTitle: How to find your rental house with MyHome24App

steps.title: Choose your preferred area
steps.text: Filter by city, region or ZIP code and narrow down your search by price range, number of rooms and living space.

steps.title: Compare listings
steps.text: Use favourites and comparison features to put different houses side by side – including equipment, location and price.

steps.title: Arrange a viewing & move in
steps.text: Contact landlords directly via MyHome24App, schedule viewing appointments and prepare documents like proof of income and credit report.

infoBoxText: For popular rental houses, speed matters. Have your proof of income, a recent credit report and a short self-disclosure ready so you can react quickly when you find the right home.
disclaimer: Note: The information on this page is for general guidance only and does not replace individual legal or financial advice. Available listings, conditions and requirements may vary by region and provider.
